title: ORBIS
description: A deep dive into linguistic evolution. This interactive one-page site visualizes the decline of global languages and the cultural heritage they carry. Built with a focus on clean data architecture and meaningful UI to bring complex statistics to life.

title: HORUS
description: An immersive journey into a low-tech futuristic underworld. Beyond the narrative, I engineered a custom secure authentication system and a branching story engine. Developed as a personal passion project, managing everything from world-building to full-stack deployment.

title: ASTDX CALCULATOR
description: A high-performance utility for the Roblox competitive scene. I reverse-engineered complex game mechanics to create a real-time damage simulator. Used by an international e-sports community to optimize strategies through dynamic data tables and precision JS logic.

title: RESTAU RE
description: Re-evaluating the culinary experience. This project involved a complete UX research phase (personas, user journeys) followed by a high-fidelity interactive prototype. It features a reliable rating system and a fully functional user account architecture.

title: MUSEORIUM
description: A digital gallery exploring the theme of Chaos through sound and motion. This project focuses on the intersection of artistic narration and front-end experimentation, using rhythmic tensions and contrasting visual landscapes to guide the user's emotions.

title: STREET DREAMS
description: A cinematic tribute to contemporary urban art. I co-directed and edited a fictional trailer inspired by Banksyâ€™s universe. This project balanced creative storytelling with technical constraints, from on-location filming to post-production visual effects.

title: ASTX COMPARATOR
description: A comprehensive census and comparison tool designed for professional tower defense players. Unlike a simple wiki, this project focuses on backend architecture, utilizing a robust SQL database and PHP to organize complex unit statistics for high-level strategic analysis.

title: HENDAYE REBRAND
description: A strategic visual overhaul for the city of Hendaye. This project bridged the gap between institutional communication and modern web design. I developed a cohesive graphic charter, promotional print assets, and a high-fidelity web interface to revitalize the city's image.
